llm_res.rule: Returns the symbol of the token. E.g. "HIX". OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
This emits when the approved address for an NFT is changed or reaffirmed. The zero address indicates there is no approved address.
Transfers of 0 values must be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
Query if an address is an authorized operator for another address
The balanceOf function should return the account balance of another account with address _owner.
